subject: Add new awards
description:
Now that stats have been improved (see #478), we can think about adding new awards. Awards should be carefully chosen in order not to incite the player to behave in a certain way (ie, "Jack the ripper" award in NQ makes players killing with knife instead of using the best weapon at hand in some situation). Instead, they should be simply informative. Here are the existing awards: 
    "Highest Fragger",
    "Highest Experience Points",
    "Highest Ranking Officer",
    "Most Highly Decorated",
    "Highest Battle Sense",     // min lvl 1
    "Best Engineer",
    "Best Medic",
    "Best Field Ops",
    "Highest Light Weapons",
    "Best Soldier",
    "Best Covert Ops",
    "Highest Accuracy",
    "I Ain’t Got No Friends Award", // min 5 tks
    "Welcome Newbie! Award",    // dont get this if any other award given or > 100 xp (this map)
Here are a few possibilities: - most death - best accuracy - most damage given - most time survived (time alive) - most gibs - ...
